A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is a great film and one of my favorites of the Star Wars franchise. Part of what I loved is that all of the fan theories turned out to be false. The movie stands on its own and does not need to fulfill every fanboys vision of what must happen. Not all of the questions are answered and that is okay. That's how life works. And I liked that each of the main characters develop within their own story arc: Poe learns how to lead\, Finn learns what is worth fighting for\, Rose learns how to be a hero\, Leia finally shows force skills\, Etc. I loved this film.
